Deliberately spreading false terrorist information by the police under criminal detention on suspicion of fabricated ,mercurial vapor pas cher, the man actually posted just to improve their online visibility . August 8 at 22 am , a website forum for such a post ,tn pas cher, the post said Games in the photo of the location of a stadium . related to post information is known ,jordan, the Shenzhen police attach great importance to the immediate mobilization of the police to inspect the venues . After repeated search ,ralph lauren pas cher, not the venue to find explosive devices. 23:00 that night , the Shenzhen police in Longgang Area Garden residential Posted by Chen Moufu control . after trial ,mercurial vapor, Chen Moufu its behavior in the online posting confessed , said of this post is just mischief ,sac burberry, in order to improve their online visibility ,burberry soldes, and now he regretted their actions . At present,ralph lauren, the suspicion of fabricating deliberately spreading false terrorist information ,louboutin, Chen Moufu police criminal detention according to law . police tips,nike tn pas cher, fabricated, intentionally spread false terrorist information seriously disrupting social order ,f50 adizero, the parties will be liable for , whether it is posting online or sending SMS ,scarpe louboutin, microblogging , we should pay attention to their own words and deeds. welcome to comment I want Related articles： the early morning of August 13, at half past the the Shengzhou Onchidium town, Chen Laotai the middle of the night to wake up the air conditioner, suddenly, I heard the downstairs window at a slight cry for help, they open the windows and doors viewing. In the night Chen Laotai the found the door neighbors relative to Granny lay a shadow, and issued a very Faint cries for help. louboutin pas cher The couple questioned the hospital medication errors caused d air jordan 纪念南京大屠杀歌曲遭篡改为言情歌曲销售 chaussures louboutin pas cher Two farmers posing P the makeup teacher named operation , claiming to be in high Admissions acquaintances, just to spend some human costs, to high candidates to do so on a regular undergraduate . Operation of a score on will certainly be admitted , to Ensure that does not crash ; paying more money only if the score can be admitted to a regular university . In this way, the operation of a continuous two cheated seven parents ranging from 2,000 yuan to 18,000 yuan , a total of 51,000 yuan .
